thread.title: Kevin Durant's mom braves the boos to cheer on her son in OKC
thread.title_full: Kevin Durant's mom braves the boos to cheer on her son in OKC

title: Kevin Durant's mom braves the boos to cheer on her son in OKC
text:
Feb 11, 2017 at 10:28p ET 0Shares 
Kevin Durant returned to Oklahoma City with extra security Saturday night. But also, more importantly, with his mom. 
Wanda Durant was right there in the middle of a hostile crowd, cheering on her son against the team he used to call home, unafraid of the boos or the bitterness. As the crowd boos Kevin Durant at the free throw line, his mother Wanda stands in support pic.twitter.com/FO8uhzFuCm 
— Anthony Slater (@anthonyVslater) February 12, 2017 
And there were plenty of boos when Durant was introduced … Response to Kevin Durant from #Thunder fans during starter introductions. Loud boos. @AP_Sports pic.twitter.com/vnaPpHKP8Z 
— Cliff Brunt (@CliffBruntAP) February 12, 2017 
… in sharp contrast to the deafening roar when Russell Westbrook was introduced. 
— Keith Absher (@keith_absher) February 12, 2017 
And there were plenty of signs with pointed messages for the former MVP… Here are some of the best signs from Kevin Durant's Oklahoma City homecoming https://t.co/MXqLFTLudp pic.twitter.com/peMs30JpF7 
— Sports Illustrated (@SInow) February 12, 2017 
… and more:
